title: BONUS EPISODE: Pusha T On Drake Beef, Kanye's 'Magic' + New Album
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Pusha T stopped through Ebro in the Morning to discuss the upcoming release of his new project 'It's Almost Dry.'

He also touched on a variety of topics including working with Pharrell and Kanye West together, Ye's magic in the studio, if a future Clipse project is in the plans, being a father, the full story behind writing the McDonald's 'I'm Loving It' jingle, what he would do if he saw Drake at a restaurant, and much more! 

LISTEN TO HOT 97's NEWEST PODCAST "TAP IN WITH TT" ON:

Apple Podcasts -https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/tap-in-with-tt/id1618314923
